item.title: Bentley Software Installation Guide
item.description: Create and setup account StepsTo do1Go to this Bentley education ==website==. (Right click and open link in new tab)2Click Log in on top right.3In the following page, click Register now.4Create an account with RMIT student email address.5Check your e-mail (check the junk mail as well) for verification code.

item.title: Code demo
item.description: This page is to demonstrate the code block: using UnityEngine; public class SimpleController : MonoBehaviour { public float speed = 5.0f; public float rotationSpeed = 100.0f; void ...

item.title: Autodesk Software Installation Guide
item.description: Create account and get licence Go to this Autodesk website. (Right click and open link in new tab) Click Sign in on top right. In the following Sign in page, click Create account.

item.title: Welcome to OENG1191
item.description: Hardware Requirements To successfully complete OENG1191, you will need a Windows laptop. The course utilises numerous industry-specific software applications, many of which are only compatible with Windows and cannot be installed on the desktop computers provided by the uni.
